#summary Console command config get
#labels console

= Config Get =

Returns the value of the requested configuration value.

== Syntax ==

{{{config get <config-name>}}}

Where:

 * config-name  Name of the configuration

== Example ==

{{{
> config get db.cache.enabled

Remote configuration: db.cache.enabled = false
}}}

== See also ==

To display the entire configuration use the [ConsoleCommandConfig config].

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
